This tutorial is intended to be a gentle introduction to argparse, the recommended command-line parsing module in the Python standard library.

Testando a inserção de um código.

 
def mode(numbers: list[float]):
    if len(numbers) == 0:
        return None
    most_frequent_number = None
    frequency_number = 0
    number = {}
    for i in numbers:
        if i not in number:
            number[i] = 0
        number[i] += 1
        if number[i] > frequency_number:
            most_frequent_number = i
            frequency_number = number[i]
    return most_frequent_number
